name: Element Fighter
description:
** Important **

I recommend using the desktop version if you run into problems with the web version.

** Controls **

WASD : Move

Left click: Basic attack

Hold right click: Beam attack

Q: Fire attack

** What to do **

Fight off 10 levels of enemies by using your elemental powers.

Be careful though, every 10 seconds nature may get in your way.

** Developer notes **

Made in about 24 hours of actually doing stuff

All the assets minus the font made by me
